mapper.select:
select * from (select t1.sysGuid, t1.bldNo, t1.cellNo, t1.floorNo, t1.roomNo, t1.address, t1.houseType from arc_houseinfo t1 minus select t2.sysGuid, t2.bldNo, t2.cellNo, t2.floorNo, t2.roomNo, t2.address, t2.houseType from mid_aks.arc_houseinfo t2 )
where rownum <= #{houseMaxNum}
select bldName from bvrfis_aks.Arc_BldInfo where bldNo = #{bldNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
